channel.title: Feed-Reader on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Feed-Reader on Arrans github.io

item.title: glanceapp/glance
item.description: A self-hosted dashboard that puts all your feeds in one place

item.title: martinrotter/rssguard
item.description: Feed reader (podcast player and also Gemini protocol client) which supports RSS/ATOM/JSON and many web-based feed services.

item.title: gugray/rss-parrot
item.description: Notifies Mastodon accounts about new posts in the RSS feeds they follow
